channel.title: Advice Line with Roy Masters - Radio Archive | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: For nearly half a century Roy Masters has been helping people overcome their most difficult problems. As the nation’s first and longest running radio counselor, Roy Masters has advised callers with a unique ability to hear inner problems, heal fears and sexual stresses, and help people take charge of their own lives. Join Roy Masters weeknights for stunning social commentary and gifted insights into personal problems and life’s most daunting challenges.

item.title: Self Esteem Problems | K6926 - May 30,2012
item.description:
Callers: A gentleman has problems with self-esteem - his parents destroyed him, and his brother has no compassion for him. A caller asks - should I give tithes to my church? A man is separated and in the process of divorce – he is looking for some advice. A caller doubts himself and feels that there is no hope. A lady is calling back – her sister is bipolar. A gentleman is calling back with a follow up (Roy had helped him before). Another man is calling back with updates on meditative experience. Click on the title to learn more about Roy Masters book How Your Mind Will Make You Well. For more information, visit http://www.fhu.com Originally aired: May 11, 2012 - Hour 2
